section.p:
If there is a tick in the box, immediately.
If not, , and read on.
You are taken to see one of their princes, in a large blue and white striped tent. Inside, a man sits on the floor at a low table. At the sight of you he leaps to his feet.

He is Akradai, Prince of the Azure Sky tribe. You saved him once, in Yellowport, Sokara. He was under a curse, and you released him from it. He promised then that he would reward you. Akradai gives you , and his shamans will cure you of any disease or poison you may be suffering from (but they cannot lift a curse).

They also prepare you a magical elixir, used by the nomads to hone their sense of direction, a
. Potions can be used just before a Difficulty roll to add 1 to the relevant ability for that one roll only. A potion of nature will add 1 to your SCOUTING ability.
The next day, you continue on your way.

choices.choice: Head west deeper into the steppes
